NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
OENO: Friends arriving from Brittle Hollow, our first shipment of ore is ready for transport to <color=orange>the forge within Hollow's Lantern!</color>
2
1
ROOT: My gratitude, Oeno. I'll make sure this ore reaches Hollow's Lantern safely!
3 1
ROOT: Oh, I almost forgot! Here are <color=orange>projection stones</color> fresh from the <color=orange>Scroll and Stone Workshop</color> on Giant's Deep, Oeno!
4
3
OENO: My word! Daz works fast, doesn't he? My gratitude for your delivery, Root! These will surely expedite progress updates between our mines, <color=orange>Hollow's Lantern</color> and the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project.</color>
5
4
ROOT: Indeed! I suggest you visit the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> through the <color=orange>projection pool</color> soon: Yarrow tells me they're ready to begin sealing off the protective shell of the central chamber today!
